meanings.definition: A painful, red, swollen lump on the eyelid caused by a bacterial infection.
meanings.sent1: The hordeola on her eyelid made it difficult for her to see clearly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with hordeola after examining her swollen eyelid.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the hordeola on her eyelid made her look like she had a tiny mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The hordeola felt like tiny volcanoes erupting on her eyelid.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing pain of the hordeola was a constant reminder of the infection.
